clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use as adjunctive therapy for the treatment of acute hyperammonemia and associated encephalopathy in patients with deficiencies in enzymes of the urea cycle

contraindications.disease: Acute oral toxicity LD50 2250 mg kg Mouse
